alert.note: Alert for Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:34AM EST until January 09 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CST FOR NORTHERN BAY...SOUTHEASTERN WALTON AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 734 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 14 miles southwest of Vernon, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Ebro, West Bay, Inlet Beach, Seminole Hills, Greenhead, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Pine Log, Sunnyside, Laird, Laguna Beach, Vicksburg, Hollywood Beach, and Riverside. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
